description.value: An extension to extend `MedicationAdministration.dosage.rate[x]` with a Range datatype to populate the minimumValue and maximumValue of AdministeringSpeed.

purpose.value: This extension represents the minimum and maximum values of AdministeringSpeed of zib [MedicationAdministration2 v1.1.1 (2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/MedicationAdministration2-v1.1.1(2020EN)).

definition.value:
The administering speed is used in slow administration of liquid. In practice, the measuring unit is almost always ml/hour. Entering an interval (such as 0-10 ml/hour) is also a commonly used option. For example, with an administering speed of 10ml/hour: - amount = 10, - dose unit = ml - time unit = hour
Optionally a translation to NHG table Gebruiksvoorschriften(Table 25) is also allowed.
The minimal value of the range. The boundary is inclusive.
The maximum value of the range. The boundary is inclusive.
